EmailTemplate.name: Effectively Scale | Dickstein Shapiro (1495028644.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Effectively Scale | Dickstein Shapiro (1495028644.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Carl, I am reaching out as I have been following the success of Blank Rome and wanted to find time to Introduce you to Turbonomic. I understand that Blank Rome has even grown by as much as 20% in 2016 with major acquisitions such as Dickstein Shapiro. Customers such as Akin Gump, Skadden Arps, Carter Mario, Mcmillan <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-McMillan-Success-Story.pdf]]> etc. have seen great success with our technology allowing them to reduce the overall cost, risk, and complexity of their infrastructures as they continue to scale. In Fact, Peter Lesser of Skadden Arps recently moderated Turbonomic’s CIO Vision Summit <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/making-meaning-turbonomic-vision-summit-2016/]]> in New York last Fall, encouraging the audience to “Build an environment where it is safer to disrupt than to sit still.” Your aspiration to innovate, much like the innovative mind set of our customers, compelled me to reach out and find time to introduce you to Turbonomic, the fastest growing company in virtualization that takes a unique approach to virtualization management. How to run capacity planning scenarios in seconds <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/how-to-run-every-capacity-planning-scenario-in-seconds/]]> 88% of Turbonomic customers see ROI in 3 months <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_ROI.pdf]]> Do you have time for an introductory call in the coming weeks? - Alex Alexander SharpSales RepresentativeO: 857.305.5803 M: 617.913.7986500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
